ProbabilityDistribution
public class BinomialDistribution
extends DiscreteDistribution

This class gives a Binomial distribution with n values of probability p.

Method Detail

getProbability

public double getProbability(int x)
Given a random variable X. Return the probability of X==x. That is the probability of value x occuring in a binomial distribution.

Specified by:
getProbability in class DiscreteDistribution
Parameters:
x - The value to compute a probability for.
Returns:
double The probability that X==x.

getMonotonicity

public Monotonicity getMonotonicity()
Used to determine convergence of a series. Return an object that describes the monotonicity of the distribution.

Returns:
Monotonicity The monotonicity of the distribution.
